subject: p13896515
History: Year old man with CHF, worsening pulmonary edema.
Impression: As compared to the previous radiograph, the severity of the pre-existing pulmonary edema has slightly worsened. The lung volumes have decreased. There are no larger pleural effusions. Moderate cardiomegaly persists.
